titleStmt.title: The English monsieur a comical novel : wherein his travells, amours, and other passages of his life no less strange than delightful, are faithfully set down by an impartial hand : in four parts.
titleStmt.author: Howard, James, fl. 1672-1674.

titleStmt.title: The English monsieur a comical novel : wherein his travells, amours, and other passages of his life no less strange than delightful, are faithfully set down by an impartial hand : in four parts.
titleStmt.author: Howard, James, fl. 1672-1674.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Howard by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Imperfect: contains only the first part.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
